comments:
20030107 build
I have customized my Java perspective and rearranged the toolbar.
Now all of the toolbar actions have disappeared.
The customization was in the Other category. I have CVS, Editor Navigation, 
External Tools, Java Coding, Java Debug, Java Navigation, Java Open Actions, 
Java Search, Launch, and Search selected.
Restarting Eclipse brought the toolbar icons back but the actions were not as I 
had rearranged them.
